title: Sawbones: Dr. Mesmer and the Power of Animal Magnetism
description:
Welcome to Sawbones, where Dr. Sydnee McElroy and her husband Justin McElroy take you on a whimsical tour of the dumb ways in which we've tried to fix people. This week: We mesmerize you.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers (http://thetaxpayers.net)
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
